root: ^You find yourself in a dark room with a computer screen and files in front of you, laid out neatly on a table.

c-0: ^The scientist has been suspected of holding blueprints for dangerous robots. Just their existence is dangerous enough to be the catalyst for international war! It's your job to sneak in and grab the blueprints to prevent warfare. Be wary, our reconaissance says the house is rigged with alarms that are more alert at the crack of dawn, which is why we sent you in late at night. Finish this, and you get the promotion you always wanted.
